column2: "...Hm, it's you. Well, what business do you have here?"
"You've got business with me, from the look of your face. ...Let's hear it."
"Indeed, I am the one who ordered a restriction on it. You've done your research."
"But, let me question you in return: ... Why do you go so far for this info?"
"\"To help someone\", huh... Perhaps. Perhaps you might."
"To correct an error, huh... So you assert that a mistake exists."
"...Those honest eyes of yours certainly remind me of another's."
"...The details of the Themis' victim list cannot be revealed to you ...For reasons I cannot say."
"I am the First of the Three Heroes, Regius. To keep the ARKS thriving is the purpose of my existence. Therefore, I stay silent."
"...However, there is something I can tell you."
"That time, I did not designate a certain region for the sortie."
"That region was around the Themis residential area."
"Yes, it was the area on the opposite side of where we met."
"...I cannot say any more, and that's all I have to tell."
